reviewText: I bought this dvd because my dad loved Mariah Carey. He said that was the worst he had ever seen.
dvd is vivid with great color sound is great mariah is always beautiful and gives a great performance don't wait get this dvd and add it too your collection very well put together
Mariah Carey Is A Excellent SINGER And This Concert You Can See Mariah And Choirs and the band make a excellent Job. Congratulations i Enjoy this Dvd.

overall this is a good dvd, not a great dvd. I wish You Knew and Can't Let Go were not sung right through, Can't let go was apruptly ended to make an anouncement of the Boyz 2 Men/Mariah duet, it was as though only a certain length of time was allowed to be recorded onto dvd and so in the editing process they were cut short or Mariah delibrately did that I am not sure, it seems to be a bad habit on the part of the production team or Mariah on her dvds, which is something to be irked about. also where was Mariah's song with snoop dogg, say somethin' or Get your number, Circles or So Lonely, it is the mimi concert afterall. It has some good features such as behind the scenes and a jukebox feature to play just the songs that you want to hear. Disc two has the adventures of mimi tour, documentary, lovers and haters and karaoke style feature, but in saying that I felt more enthusis was placed on the features rather than the concert, it should of had more songs, played in full, more focus on Mariah, more interesting choreography. Madonna - The Confessions Tour is an example of an awesome live tour and also Showgirl: The Greatest Hits Tour. I would recommend to buy instead Fantasy - Mariah Carey at Madison Square Garden and/or MTV Unplugged Of Mariah Carey singing live. A Dvd collection of all her singles, video clips, (not just concert versions like on number 1's) that would be better, it would be the Ideal Mariah Carey Dvd not these others she has been thurning out, sorry Mariah. I like Mariah Careys' songs so that made it o.k, but it could have been better. Track Listing It's like that Heartbreaker Dreamlover My All Shake it Off Vision of Love fly like a bird I'll be there fantasy don't forget about us always be my baby honey I wish you knew can't let go one sweet day hero make it happen we belong together butterfly reprise bonus features behind the scenes jukebox feature Disc 2 the adventures of mimi documentary lovers and haters karaoke style feature.
